skills.name: Identify pairs of numbers that satisfy an equation with two unknowns
Identify pairs of numbers that satisfy an equation given in words

explanations.A: This could be correct if it was the cost of one shirt and one jumper. But how many shirts are we buying?
explanations.B: This could be correct if it was the cost of two shirts and two jumpers. But how many jumpers are we buying?
explanations.C: The cost of 2 shirts is 2 x £17 which gives us £34. We then add on the cost of 1 jumper: £34 + £20 = £54
explanations.D: This could be correct if it was the cost of one shirt and two jumpers. But how many of each are we buying? Read the question carefully
